changes.change: Profile page is now tabbed; it looks a lot better now!

Added privacy controls in your Profile for opting out of Google Analytics cookies and disabling Personalized Ads for Google Adsense. With both options enabled, you should have no third-party cookies on your browser from Keystone.guru.
Now users now have to explicitly agree to the privacy policy, terms of service and the cookie policy. Existing users have to give their consent to continue using the site.
